full_text:
VIOLATION/PENALTY.

	Violations of this chapter shall be treated as a strict liability offense regardless of intent.  Any person, firm and/or corporation that violates any portion of this section shall be subject to prosecution and/or administrative enforcement under the Los Angeles Municipal Code.  Administrative penalties imposed pursuant to this ordinance shall not exceed $100,000 per property.

3.catch_line: Recordation Of Transfer Of Loan And/Or Deed Of Trust And/Or Assignment Of Rents.

5.catch_line: Maintenance And Enforcement Of Maintenance Requirements.

6.catch_line: Maintenance Of Vacant Properties And Enforcement Of Vacant Property Maintenance Requirements.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

VIOLATION/PENALTY. (§ 164.08)

  VIOLATION/PENALTY.	Violations of this chapter shall be treated as a strict
liability offense regardless of intent.  Any person, firm and/or corporation
that violates any portion of this section shall be subject to prosecution and/or
administrative enforcement under the Los Angeles Municipal Code. 
Administrative penalties imposed pursuant to this ordinance shall not exceed
$100,000 per property.
